title: [Documentation]: Document the env variable: MsBuildSkipEagerWildCardEvaluationRegexes
body:
### Summary

Document in the wiki the usage of MsBuildSkipEagerWildCardEvaluationRegexes  env variable

### Background and Motivation

During the investigation of https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/issues/9736 it took time to understand how it should work.  

### Proposed Feature

I was not able to find all the env variable list that are being considered during the build. A file containing all the env var list for msbuild would be very helpful 

### Alternative Designs

_No response_
